sentences.en: Commuter airlines fly to out-of-the-way places. And business travelers are the ones who go to those locations.
sentences.cn: 支线航空公司航班飞往偏僻地区。商务旅客就是会前往那些地区的人。

sentences.en: Commuter car left, the school playground was particularly quiet too.
sentences.cn: 通勤车走后, 学校操场上就显得特别得安静.

sentences.en: Fires broke out at three railway stations, halting service on two commuter lines for several hours.
sentences.cn: 三个火车站发生了火灾，两条通勤线路的服务被迫中断数小时。

sentences.en: I asked if she meant to fly to Pensacola a commuter plane.
sentences.cn: 我问她是不是要达成往返飞机飞往朋沙科拉.

sentences.en: In Central American cities, it was used in commuter fleets.
sentences.cn: 在中美洲城市, 它被用做上下班的班车.

sentences.en: Let's hurry, or we're going to miss the commuter bus.
sentences.cn: 如果咱们不快点儿走, 就要赶不上通勤车了.

sentences.en: Major commuter arteries were choked with stalled traffic.
sentences.cn: 主要的交通干线都挤满了堵塞的车辆.

sentences.en: Manager Li: This is your timecard attendance at the commuter time everyday.
sentences.cn: 李经理: 这是你的工卡,上下班时要打卡.

sentences.en: Passenger traffic on the commuter line has decreased during the summer.
sentences.cn: 夏季,通勤线上的旅客数量有所减少.

sentences.en: Police cordoned off the road and diverted commuter traffic.
sentences.cn: 警察封锁了道路并分流交通.

sentences.en: She accidentally stepped on his foot on a crowded commuter train.
sentences.cn: 她在拥挤的通勤列车上不小心踩到了他的脚。

sentences.en: Six million commuter travel to work by rail each day.
sentences.cn: 每天有600万乘客(通勤人员)乘火车上班.

sentences.en: The average commuter journey there is five hours long.
sentences.cn: 那里的通勤一族平均上下班要花5个小时。

sentences.en: The commuter plane was waiting for takeoff.
The deal would have reduced competition in the commuter-aircraft market.
sentences.cn: 这项协议原本会减少通勤航班市场的竞争。

words.tran_cn: 减刑；交换；经常来往；代偿
乘公交车上下班；经常往来
减刑；交换；用……交换；使……变成

trans.tran_en: someone who travels a long distance to work every day
